# audioTimePitchAlgorithm

**Instance Property**

The processing algorithm used to manage audio pitch for scaled audio edits.

## Declaration

```swift
var audioTimePitchAlgorithm: AVAudioTimePitchAlgorithm? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The supported constants are defined in Time Pitch Algorithm Settings. An [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSExceptionName/invalidArgumentException] is raised if this property is set to a value other than the defined constants.

## Time pitch settings

- **AVAudioTimePitchAlgorithm**: An algorithm used to set the audio pitch as the rate changes.
